description: Missing persons from California - individuals who have disappeared and are awaiting reunion with their families

targets.name: Missing Children - California
targets.description: Children reported missing in California who have not yet been found
targets.intention: May all missing children in California be found safe, returned to loving homes, and healed from trauma

targets.name: Missing Adults - California
targets.description: Adults reported missing in California who have not yet been located
targets.intention: May all missing adults in California be found, and may their families find peace and closure

targets.name: Endangered Missing Persons - California
targets.description: Individuals considered to be in immediate danger who have gone missing in California
targets.intention: May all endangered missing persons in California be found quickly and brought to safety

targets.name: Missing Indigenous Persons - California
targets.description: Indigenous people who have gone missing in California, particularly from tribal communities
targets.intention: May all missing indigenous persons in California be found, may their communities find healing and justice

targets.name: Missing Migrant Workers - California
targets.description: Migrant agricultural workers who have disappeared while working in California
targets.intention: May all missing migrant workers in California be found, may they have safe working conditions and fair treatment

targets.name: Missing Persons with Mental Health Conditions - California
targets.description: Individuals with mental health conditions who have gone missing in California
targets.intention: May all missing persons with mental health conditions in California be found safely and receive compassionate care

targets.name: Cold Case Missing Persons - California
targets.description: Long-term missing persons cases in California that have gone unsolved for years
targets.intention: May all cold case missing persons in California be found, may their families find answers and peace

data_sources: California Department of Justice Cold Case Unit
Local law enforcement cold case divisions
